content:
本件保存七年
02-62- 1670
May 28, 2
MEMORANDUM
To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
From : C. C. Chang
Original signed by Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment
Project No. Y-99-AX (99-47]>
Reference is made to the attached Report of Excess Equipment and copies of SDC letter SDC-5181 dated May 22, 1962 and EKA letter MK-1508 dated May 21, 1962.
In the above letter, SDC requested that two Fan Axivane, motor blower assembly and one Pump immersion be procured. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
E-16.13.2
Enel. Report
Copies of SDC/MKA letters
cc: SDC
JGWhite (with copies of SDC/MKA letters)
BES

paragraphs.content: To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
Original signed by Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
Reference is made to the attached Report of Excess Equipment and copies of SDC letter SDC-5181 dated May 22, 1962 and EKA letter MK-1508 dated May 21, 1962.

In the above letter, SDC requested that two Fan Axivane, motor blower assembly and one Pump immersion be procured. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
